value:
$WmMPID_エスト,ch01_20_Est_F_Normal,Face|It's time to show my sisters what
we're made of! Come on, red army,
let's get in there!$k$p$WmMPID_カチュア,ch01_19_Katua_F_Normal,Face|On my honor as a Whitewing, I will
not lose. Blue army, with me! Into
the fray!$k$p$WmMPID_パオラ,ch01_18_Paora_F_Normal,Face|It appears my sisters are going
all out... All right, green army, let's
not keep them waiting!$k$p
